name: HP potion
description: Increases everyones HP by 10. Ignores bleed debuff

name: Chilly
description: Sets all enemies on fire for 3 turns

name: Venom Sample
description: Sets all enemies on poison for 3 turns

name: Grenade
description: Deals 3 damage to all enemies. Ignores tough buffs

name: Dice
description: Each enemy takes a random amount of damage from 1 to 5

name: Pure Fragment
description: Your whole team gets the pure buff for 2 turns
